location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 30/6 'Persian Gulf. Bahrein [sic]: Trade Reports 1928 to'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 237; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An external leather cover wraps around the documents; the inside front cover has been foliated as f 1. A previous foliation sequence, which is present between ff 2-236 and is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: This file contains copies of annual trade reports that were compiled by the Political Agency in Bahrain and printed in India.The reports contain detailed lists of all trade shipped in and out of Bahrain and the country's primary importers and exporters as well as general trade and financial information as complied by the Political Agent.In addition to the trade reports themselves, the file also contains related correspondence between British officials and material that was used in their preparation.The file includes a divider at its front which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year.
